quote: I can handle Glory."" ""Can you?"" Eve asked. ""Because I notice you never call her Gloriana. Just Glory."" He shut up. Which is probably about the only smart thing he can do, Claire thought.
quote_letters: I CAN HANDLE GLORY CAN YOU EVE ASKED BECAUSE I NOTICE YOU NEVER CALL HER GLORIANA JUST GLORY HE SHUT UP WHICH IS PROBABLY ABOUT THE ONLY SMART THING HE CAN DO CLAIRE THOUGHT
